teams.name: Caroline's 50th Birthday
teams.loan_because: When someone asks you 'what do you want for your birthday?' -  you can't think of anything you actually need!
teams.description:
I hope to create a team for those wishing (very kindly) to offer a lasting present to a friend or family member.  What could be better than 'giving' a present that will be repaid and can then be 'given' to another.  The perpetual birthday present. There are so many of us who accept presents that we really don't need or even want - how much more generous the gift would be if it could be redirected to another person/family where it can really make a difference?
This team is open to anyone - so please pass on the message.

teams.name: Vegetarians and Vegans on Kiva
teams.loan_because: We have a vision of a healthier, more compassionate and sustainable world. Hard work is often not enough to escape poverty and we gladly welcome the opportunity to give people and their businesses a fighting chance. Our team focus is on making loans to borrowers who don't use animals in their businesses.
teams.description: We're vegetarians and vegans, and those thinking about making the change.  We welcome everyone regardless of their motivation for going veggie.

teams.whereabouts: New York, Boston, London, Los Angeles
teams.loan_because: we're all about finding and enacting innovative programs that have a dramatic impact on the lives of the working poor.

teams.loan_because: it's inspired action and a joyful expression of gratitude.

teams.name: Washington State
teams.loan_because: Each of us has a responsibility to all of us.

teams.name: India
teams.loan_because: "What we should aim at is the creation of people power, which is opposed to the power of violence and is different from the coercive power of state." - Vinoba Bhave
teams.description:
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty.

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe. We love India - therefore we are the Kiva Team India. We love to use the Kiva concept to provide loans in India ! http://www.kiva.org/india

Funding loans from India: http://www.kiva.org/lend?countries=IN

http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva/2012/08/15/kiva-launches-in-india.html

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: FlyerTalkers
teams.loan_because: We want to fight global poverty while earning miles.
teams.description:
Kiva is an officially approved FlyerTalk charity. 

Update the FT community about your lending on this thread:

teams.name: Kiva Muslims
teams.loan_because:
002.271 Yusuf Ali Translation:
If ye disclose (acts of) charity, even so it is well, but if ye conceal them, and make them reach those (really) in need, that is best for you: It will remove from you some of your (stains of) evil. And Allah is well acquainted with what ye do.
teams.description: Insha'Allah our team will be a collaboration of people from all walks of life united by one goal: to help those less fortunate and displaying great appreciation to our creator for blessing us to help make a differerence in the world.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

teams.loan_because: we care!
teams.description: (not directly affiliated with the school)

teams.name: Friends of Bob Harris
teams.loan_because:
After stumbling into a job as a luxury travel writer, I saw so much poverty that I decided to turn those paychecks into Kiva loans. Then I visited a bunch of clients, who were amazing, and I've written a book about it called "The International Bank of Bob" (Walker/Bloomsbury, March 5, 2013).

I hope the book will get more people to feel a greater understanding of Kiva, a better appreciation of the role of microfinance, and most of all, more connected to the rest of the world.
teams.description: People who realize that if we switched places with the recipients, they'd loan to us just as happily.  So, fair's fair.

teams.name: TCS

teams.description: Social group

teams.name: Kredit Microfinance Cambodia (Formerly CREDIT)
teams.loan_because: We want to support the borrowers of Kredit Microfinance in Cambodia.
teams.description:
Our team lends to Kredit Microfinance in Cambodia!

Kredit Microfinance is one of Kiva's oldest and largest partners, with over $4 million in Kiva loans as of September 2010. To learn more about Kredit Microfinance, please visit their partner page    www.kiva.org/partners/9 or Kredit Microfinance's website     http://www.credit.com.kh/

Join our lending team and help us lend to Kredit Microfinance!

teams.name: Ian Martin Group
teams.loan_because:
We see a world with each and every person pursuing meaningful work.

So in 2014, we are "Redeeming the Resume Black Hole" by asking all 100,000+ people who apply to jobs through the Ian Martin Group, to use our funds to make a loan on Kiva!

For more:
http://ianmartin.com/blog/2014/01/redeeming-the-resume-black-hole/

Check out our progress here: http://www.kiva.org/team/ianmartin/goals
teams.description:
Founded in 1957, the Ian Martin Group is North America's most progressive recruitment and project-staffing firm.  As a Certified B Corporation, we meet comprehensive standards that measure our impact on employees, suppliers, community, and the environment. Our guiding statement is: “building authentic connections around meaningful work.”
 
The Ian Martin family includes technical recruitment divisions IME, IMT and IMIT – experts in Engineering, Telecom and IT respectively. The 500 Staffing is best understood as 'not so’ General Staffing and Ian Martin Executive which focuses on providing exceptional business leadership to technical and scientific centered organizations. 

http://ianmartin.com
http://ianmartin.com/blog
https://twitter.com/IanMartinGroup
https://facebook.com/IanMartinGroup
http://bcorporation.net/ianmartingroup

teams.name: Kimberly and Peter's Wedding
teams.loan_because: We're excited to share the joy of our wedding with you, and maybe make the world a little bit better!
teams.description: We've been making loans on kiva.org for several years now. Honestly, we don't need that much more "stuff," and we thought that making a loan to some one in need in our honor would be a win-win-win scenario!

teams.name: HP
teams.loan_because:
This is a unique opportunity for HP employees globally to actively participate in driving HP Living Progress by supporting thousands of entrepreneurs around the world who need access to capital to start or grow their business. HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.description:

We come together to make a change in our world.

Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/KivaPittsburgh

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Courthouse Clinics
teams.loan_because: We believe that more fortunate people need to start taking charge of problems that are happening in other countries and all over. We can no longer just turn away, because in our current interdependent economy, we are all responsible. We like this website because it encourages people to be more responsible for the money that they are receiving, teaching them how to run a business, so hopefully one day they will no longer need that hand up. This is also a great way to improve communities all over the world and we truly believe that this is more then worthwhile!
teams.description: A friendly, dedicated, hardworking team who believe that anything can be achieved when working together towards a high goal. We are very proud of our business and the work we do, and love the thought that with this website we are in a position to help others do the same!

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: Kiva Mormons
teams.loan_because: "A man filled with the love of God is not content with blessing his family alone, but ranges through the whole world, anxious to bless the whole human race." ~ Joseph Smith
teams.description: Members and friends of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints who are also Kiva lenders.

teams.name: Team Amaya Dugal
teams.loan_because: we want to teach our young daughter, Amaya, about the importance of helping others.
teams.description: we organzied this team to start a foundation of giving back for Amaya.  As a baby she won't understand  however as she grows up, she will start to connect the dots.  The idea is that she will lead the Team as she gets older and her reach of influence will be larger than just her parents.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: CSUF Cambodian Student Association
teams.loan_because: We feel that we as a community here in America we can help with the Cambodian community because every little bit helps.
teams.description: Cal State Fullerton Cambodian Student Association is an organization that came together to learn more about the Cambodian culture. We also try to educate,preserve, and learn more about our culture or inspire others by the Cambodian culture.

teams.name: Friends of Bob Harris
teams.loan_because:
After stumbling into a job as a luxury travel writer, I saw so much poverty that I decided to turn those paychecks into Kiva loans. Then I visited a bunch of clients, who were amazing, and I've written a book about it called "The International Bank of Bob" (Walker/Bloomsbury, March 5, 2013).

I hope the book will get more people to feel a greater understanding of Kiva, a better appreciation of the role of microfinance, and most of all, more connected to the rest of the world.
teams.description: People who realize that if we switched places with the recipients, they'd loan to us just as happily.  So, fair's fair.

teams.name: Auburn University
teams.loan_because: These loans allow people who have limited access to capital, to invest in their futures and improve their lives.  It's the right thing to do.

teams.name: Photoburst - Travel Photography
teams.loan_because: We want to help people who wouldn't qualify for bank loans to improve their lives through their own work.
teams.description:
One year after we started photoburst.net, a travel photography website, our perception of the world has changed immensely... 
We don't want to use or associate ourselves to the fuzzy "responsible travel" concept.
By creating this team, we just hope people with travel and/or photography as common interests come together with a higher purpose. 
Anyone is welcome to join us!

teams.name: Humanitas
teams.loan_because:
Esta equipa celebra a vida, o ser humano e a lusofonia.
A intenção desta equipa é a de unir as pessoas em torno deste capital comum. Defendemos os empréstimos a 0% de juro como uma forma de gerar emprego sustentável e esperamos desta forma incentivar o nascimento de movimentos de microcrédito por todo o mundo lusófono.

Todos são convidados a entrar. O nosso objectivo é chegarmos aos 100 mil membros no fim do ano. Se apenas 10% tiver feito um empréstimo teremos gerado 250 mil dólares em menos de um ano. Imaginam a quantidade de vidas que podem mudar neste processo?
teams.description:
A origem do nome da equipa vem de Machado de Assis:

"- Queres ser meu discípulo?
- Quero.
- Bem, irás entendendo aos poucos a minha filosofia; no dia em que a houveres penetrado inteiramente, ah! nesse dia terás o maior prazer da vida, porque não há vinho que embriague como a verdade. Crê-me, o Humanitismo é o remate das cousas; e eu que o formulei, sou o maior homem do mundo.
Olha, vês como o meu bom Quincas Borba está olhando para mim? Não é
ele, é Humanitas...
- Mas que Humanitas é esse?
- Humanitas é o princípio. Há nas cousas todas certa substância recôndita e idêntica, um princípio único, universal, eterno, comum, indivisível e indestrutível, - ou, para usar a linguagem do grande Camões:

Uma verdade que nas cousas anda 
Que mora no visíbil e no invisíbil.

Pois essa substância ou verdade, esse princípio indestrutível é que é Humanitas. Assim lhe chamo, porque resume o universo, e o universo é o homem. Vais entendendo?"

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.name: Kiva Muslims
teams.loan_because:
002.271 Yusuf Ali Translation:
If ye disclose (acts of) charity, even so it is well, but if ye conceal them, and make them reach those (really) in need, that is best for you: It will remove from you some of your (stains of) evil. And Allah is well acquainted with what ye do.
teams.description: Insha'Allah our team will be a collaboration of people from all walks of life united by one goal: to help those less fortunate and displaying great appreciation to our creator for blessing us to help make a differerence in the world.

teams.name: Colette Patterns
teams.loan_because: We are women and men who sew, helping our fellow sewists.
